__e: You think he's not gonna find out, man?
If you do, then you should not doubt that he died a hero's death.
She must have known long ago he was dead - we all did.
Only in myself... for ever doubting that you wouldn't be able to pick out the right guy for you.
Do not let your father doubt you the better man.
I didn't see you, so I should have known you were there.
But if it's in that diary, I have no reason to doubt that it's true.
You should know I didn't mean, uh, 68% of the stuff I just said.
You think someone who knows nothing about me may suspect I have the sick mind?
You don't know me well enough to doubt me.
Look, Will, now is no time to go all wobbly on me.
I know you have every reason to doubt me, after what I did to you.
I don't know how i ever doubted you.
You have to be ready for what's coming, and you can't doubt yourself.
I just keep wanting to believe you, but how can I when at every turn, you give me reason to doubt you?
He's kind and decent, and nothing you could say will ever make me doubt him again.
I know what it's like to be afraid of my own body, to not be sure what it's gonna do next.
Lucy, I am begging you, if you have seen anything, heard anything, even the slightest thing that would give you cause to doubt him...
Reginald will start to doubt everything he's heard to her detriment.
Far be it for me to question the power of three after all these years.
I'm sure of Father, and now I want to be sure, very, very sure of you.
